2.label: I1 basic on/off
2.description: Triggered at change of the input I1 state and reflecting its state

3.label: I1 start/stop level change
3.description: Triggered at change of the input I1 state and reflecting its state

4.label: Multilevel
4.description: Triggered at changes of state/value of the Flush Dimmer

5.label: I2 basic on/off
5.description: Triggered at change of the input I2 state and reflecting its state

6.label: I2 notification report
6.description: Triggered at change of the input I2 state and reflecting its state

7.label: I2 binary sensor
7.description: Triggered at change of the input I2 state and reflecting its state

8.label: I3 basic on/off
8.description: Triggered at change of the input I3 state and reflecting its state

9.label: I3 notification report
9.description: Triggered at change of the input I3 state and reflecting its state

10.label: I3 binary sensor
10.description: Triggered at change of the input I3 state and reflecting its state

11.label: Multilevel sensor
11.description: Triggered at change of temperature sensor

10.label: Activate / deactivate functions ALL ON / ALL OFF
10.description: Flush dimmer module responds to commands ALL ON / ALL OFF

options.label: ALL ON is not active, ALL OFF is not active
ALL ON is not active, ALL OFF active
ALL ON active, ALL OFF is not active
ALL ON active, ALL OFF active

11.label: Automatic turning off output after set time
11.description: Auto OFF enabled with defined time, step is 1 second.

12.label: Automatic turning on output after set time
12.description: Auto ON enabled with defined time, step is 1 second.

20.label: Enable / Disable 3-way switch
20.description: Dimming is done by push button or switch connected to I1.

21.label: Enable / Disable Double click function
21.description: A fast double click on the push button will set dimming power at maximum.

30.label: Saving the state after a power failure

40.label: Power reporting in watts on power change
40.description: Set value is percentage, set value from 0 - 100 = 0% - 100%.

42.label: Power reporting in Watts by time interval
42.description: Set value means time interval (0 â€“ 32767) in seconds.

60.label: Minimum dimming value
60.description: Minimum dimming value is set by entered value.

61.label: Maximum dimming value
61.description: Maximum dimming value is set by entered value.

65.label: Dimming time (soft on/off)
65.description: Set value means time of moving the Dimmer between min. and max. dimming values

66.label: Dimming time when key pressed
66.description: Time of moving the Dimmer between min. and max dimming values

67.label: Ignore start level
67.description: This parameter is used with association group 3

68.label: Dimming duration
68.description: This parameter is used with association group 3

100.label: Enable / Disable Endpoints I2
100.description: Enabling I2 means that Endpoint (I2) will be present on UI.

101.label: Enable / Disable Endpoints I3
101.description: Enabling I3 means that Endpoint (I3) will be present on UI.

120.label: Digital temperature sensor reporting
120.description: Module reports measured temperature on defined temperature change
